mapper.select: -- getSpaceRqprApprCompleteList 평가의뢰 요청 결재 완료 리스트 조회 select mst.rqpr_id as rqprId ,mst.space_name as spaceNm ,dbo.fn_getUserName(mst.rgst_id) + ' ' + dbo.fn_getUserJobxName(mst.rgst_id) as rgstNm ,dbo.fn_getDeptName(dbo.fn_getDeptCode(mst.rgst_id)) as rgstDeptNm ,dbo.fn_getUserEmail(mst.rgst_id) as rgstEmail ,mst.rqpr_dt as rqprDt ,dbo.fn_getSpaceCrgrJobxDeptNames(mst.rqpr_id) as chrgNm ,dbo.fn_getSpaceEmailReceivers(mst.rqpr_id) as receivers --담당자 + 의뢰자 + 리더 + 통보자 from iris_space_rqpr_mst mst where mst.space_acpc_st_cd = '02' and mst.del_yn = 'N' and mst.space_chrg_trsf_flag = 'W'

-- getSpaceRsltApprCompleteList 평가 결과 결재 완료 리스트 조회 select mst.rqpr_id as rqprId ,mst.space_name as spaceNm ,mst.acpc_no as acpcNo ,dbo.fn_getUserName(mst.rgst_id) + ' ' + dbo.fn_getUserJobxName(mst.rgst_id) as rgstNm ,dbo.fn_getDeptName(dbo.fn_getDeptCode(mst.rgst_id)) as rgstDeptNm ,dbo.fn_getSpaceCrgrJobxDeptNames(mst.rqpr_id) as chrgNm ,mst.acpc_dt as acpcDt ,mst.cmpl_dt as cmplDt ,dbo.fn_getSpaceEmailReceivers(mst.rqpr_id) as receivers --담당자 + 의뢰자 + 리더 + 통보자 from iris_space_rqpr_mst mst where mst.space_acpc_st_cd = '07' and mst.del_yn = 'N' and mst.rgst_trsf_flag = 'W'

-- getSpaceRsltApprTodoList select rqpr_id as rqprId ,(select sa_sabun_new from iris_sso_user where sa_user = rgst_Id) as sabun from IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST where space_acpc_st_cd = '07' and del_yn = 'N' and TO_DO_Flag not in ('Y', 'T')
mapper.update: -- saveSpaceRqprTodo 공간평가시험 todo정보 생성 EXEC TODO.dbo.UP_MW_TODO_REQ 'IRI', 'SPC', #{rqprId}, #{sabun}
-- updateSpaceChrgTrsfFlag update iris_space_rqpr_mst set space_chrg_trsf_flag = 'Y' where rqpr_id = ${rqprId}
-- updateRgstTrsfFlag update iris_space_rqpr_mst set rgst_trsf_flag = 'Y' where rqpr_id = ${rqprId}
-- updateSpaceTodoFlag update IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST set TO_DO_Flag = 'T' where rqpr_id = ${rqprId}
mapper.select: -- getSpaceEvRnewMailList select fnh_vld_dt as fnhVldDt ,b.ctgr_nm as ctgrNm ,a.scn as scn ,a.ev_cd as evCd ,(b.ctgr_nm+'제품의 '+a.scn) as titl , ( select distinct stuff (( select ','+sa_mail from [dbo].[IRIS_SSO_USER] a ,dbo.IRIS_ADM_COM_CD b where a.sa_sabun_new = b.com_dtl_cd and b.com_cd_cd='space_user' FOR XML PATH('') ),1,1,'') AS saMail ) AS receivers from dbo.IRIS_SPACE_MTRL_UTM_EV a, iris_space_ev_ctgr3 b where a.ctgr3 = b.ctgr_cd and a.del_yn = 'N' and a.snd_eml_yn = 'Y' and (strt_vld_dt = CONVERT(CHAR(10), dateadd(month,-6,getdate()), 23) or strt_vld_dt = CONVERT(CHAR(10), dateadd(month,-3,getdate()), 23) or strt_vld_dt = CONVERT(CHAR(10), dateadd(month,-1,getdate()), 23))
